companyName: The Keefe Law Firm, LLC - Lakewood, OH

description:
I am attorney Stephen T. Keefe Jr. and through my law office in Lakewood, Ohio, The Keefe Law Firm, LLC, I provide the personalized assistance and effective representation my plaintiff clients deserve as they seek justice for the injuries and losses they sustained as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Over the course of my nearly 20 years as a personal injury attorney, I have achieved notable success advocating on behalf of individuals and their families during their most difficult and uncertain times, and to date, I have recovered over $45 million in settlements and awards for those in need.

Unlike other injury law firms in the area, I handle only a few, select cases at any given time to ensure I am able to devote more of my attention to each of my clients, and I have developed long-lasting relationships with those I have served through my open and honest communication and unwavering commitment to their needs.

Personable and responsive, I will always treat you with compassion and dignity as I work diligently to help you secure the full amount of compensation you need to cover your medical bills, lost wages and other economic and noneconomic damages. I am always available to address your questions and concerns as they arise, and I promise to keep you updated as to the status of your case so there will be no surprises.

To find out more about how The Keefe Law Firm, LLC, can best serve your needs while helping you secure a brighter future for yourself and your family, you can contact me at my Lakewood law office to schedule a free initial consultation.
